variable.name: SAMP_SOURCE
variable.description: Source repository where samples originate [Uropath (Australia), Weill Cornell Medical College]

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: The type of experimental data associated with the sample instance [SNP_Array=SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; mRNA_Expression=Expression data for mRNA sample; WGS_SRA=Whole genome sequencing data available through SRA; WES_SRA=Whole exome sequencing data available through SRA]
variable.value: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays
Whole exome sequencing data available through SRA
Whole genome sequencing data available through SRA
